title: IMoveCopyBodyFeatureData.TransformZ
description: Gets the z coordinate for either moving or rotating the selected bodies.
returns: Meters for moving or radians for rotating
remarks:
Use
IMoveCopyBodyFeatureData::TransformType
to get or set the transform type before setting this property.
IMoveCopyBodyFeatureData::TransformReferenceEntity
must be:
NULL if moving the selected bodies
- or -
a vertex if rotating the selected bodies

examples.title: Move and Copy Body By Setting Transforms (VBA)
